constants.internetError: Please reconnect to the internet to use this feature

transactionLabelText._comment: payment time is formatted as 'time time-passed ago' or '12 minutes ago'

disclaimerPage.subHeader: Blitz doesn't have access to any of your funds, if funds are lost we can not help you recover them.
disclaimerPage.imgCaption: 'With great power comes great responsibility' - Uncle Ben

securityOptionPage.header: First, Let's create your recovery phrase
securityOptionPage.subHeader: A recovery phrase is a series of 12 words in a specific order. This word combination is unique to your wallet. Make sure to have a pen and paper ready so you can write it down.

generateKeyPage.header: This is your password to your money, if you lose it you lose your money!
generateKeyPage.subHeader: Write it down with pen and paper and keep it safe!
generateKeyPage.disclaimer: WE CAN NOT HELP YOU IF YOU LOSE IT

skipMessage.header: We recommend that you write down your seed phrase
skipMessage.subHeader: If you do not have your seed phrase written down you risk losing your money.

home.error1: Please enter all of your keys.
home.error2: This is not a valid mnemonic.
home.error3: Your words are not the same as the generated words

manualInputPage.inputPlaceholder: Enter or paste a Liquid, or Lightning address/invoice

wallet.no_transaction_history: Send or receive a transaction for it to show up here

cameraPage.settingsText: Go to settings to let Blitz Wallet access your camera
cameraPage.noCameraDevice: You do not have a camera device.
cameraPage.error1: Device does not have a tourch
cameraPage.error2: You have already paid this invoice

about.text2: Blitz is a free and open source app under the
about.text5: This is a self-custodial Bitcoin wallet. Blitz does not have access to your funds, if you lose your backup phrase it may result in a loss of funds.
about.text14: in the beginning and will open a lightning channel for you after you reach a balance of
about.text15: to help you have a good and consistent experience with the Lightning Network.

displayoptions.text6: Please reconnect to the internet to switch your denomination
displayoptions.text12: Swipe right from the main screen—whether you're on Contacts, Wallet, or the Home page—to quickly open the camera for scanning.

loadingScreen.loadingText: We're setting things up. Hang tight! This could take up to a minute.
loadingScreen.errorText1: Error connecting to your node. Try reloading the app.
